backend/main.mo: Canister storing user profiles and timestamped messages with access control for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing many frontend files and their roles across the application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, onboarding logic, and wraps the app with I18nProvider.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24Car: Reusable card component applying consistent styling and optional click behavior.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24For: Reusable form field wrapper with label, helper text, and error display.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactV: Modal dialog for contacting a worker with form validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/contact/Work24Of: Dialog showing official Work24 contact phone and email details using translations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Renders the site footer with contact info, service text, quick links, and branding using i18n strings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Builds a responsive header with navigation, language switching, and optional admin links based on authentication.
Wraps the page with a header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/materials/Materi: Displays a material’s image, details, and a contact button using sanitized data.
frontend/src/components/settings/Languag: Provides a dropdown to switch app languages using i18n state.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Shows worker info, a work gallery with image dialogs, and a contact button using sanitized worker data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches admin messages from the backend actor via a react-query hook.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, translation lookup, and persistence for the app.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and translation keys for the app’s UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/adminAllowlist.ts: Provides a frontend-only admin allowlist check and controls admin UI visibility.
frontend/src/lib/contactSubmissions.ts: Defines contact submission types and a React Query mutation for sending submissions via the actor.
frontend/src/lib/formatIcTime.ts: Converts bigint nanosecond IC timestamps into readable locale strings.
frontend/src/lib/localPreferences.ts: Manages onboarding, username, and language preferences in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/materialsStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves material items in localStorage and generates IDs for new materials.
frontend/src/lib/officialContact.ts: Exports official phone and email constants along with formatted link versions.
Sanitizes worker and material objects by whitelisting allowed fields.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Defines the service catalog with IDs, translation keys, and icons, with a lookup helper.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides simple validation helpers for required fields and mobile numbers.
frontend/src/lib/workersStorage.ts: Handles worker storage in localStorage, including filtering and ID generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Renders the app root with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays backend‑fetched messages with authentication and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Architect.tsx: Form page for architect project submissions with validation, file handling, and contact submission.
frontend/src/pages/Career.tsx: Career application form with validation and submission through the contact handler.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUs.tsx: Renders a contact page with phone, email, services info, and response-time text using i18n values.
frontend/src/pages/HomeServices.tsx: Displays a homepage hero section and a grid of service cards linking to service detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/Materials.tsx: Shows a list of stored materials with contact panel support or an empty-state message.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Provides onboarding form to collect name and language, validate input, save preferences, and redirect home.
frontend/src/pages/SellerMaterialSubmiss: Form for sellers to submit material data with images, validation, base64 conversion, and storage.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Displays service details and associated workers, allowing opening a contact dialog for a selected worker.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerSubmission.tsx: Worker profile submission form handling validation, image uploads, base64 conversion, and storage.
frontend/src/types/materials.ts: Defines the Material interface with id, metadata fields, images, and optional location.
frontend/src/types/workers.ts: Defines the Worker interface with identity, skills, service category, images, and optional location.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including feature lists, admin-page requirements, and metadata for viewing canister‑stored data.
